bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names hou zhong sheng rou 喉中生肉 , tumorous flesh-growth in the throat. Pathological Condition of xi rou 瘜肉 , tumorous flesh-growth, in the throat. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry yang ti cao 羊蹄草 quoting Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 35: 治懸壅腫及咽喉內有息肉 , “It cures uvula swelling and tumorous flesh-growth inside the throat”, writes: 懸壅舌腫，咽生 瘜肉 , “Uvula and tongue swelling; the throat grows tumorous flesh ”.
